title: Flexible Language Learning Design Through Collaborative Learning Tool Orchestration

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Working professionals experience flexible learning design using collaborative learning tools and mobile environments to improve language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently manage team projects by linking data across collaborative learning tools.
Learners can construct context-specific personalized learning paths using IMS-LD-based instructional design.
Learners can incorporate real-time feedback by utilizing the mediation features of collaborative learning tools in mobile environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
